greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the solution to (1 - x)*(1 + x)^x = x^x.
mathematica: Take[RealDigits[x /. FindRoot[(1 - x)*(1 + x)^x == x^x, {x, 1/2}, WorkingPrecision -> 120], 10][[1]], 105]
program: (PARI) solve(x=1/3, 1, (1 - x)*(1 + x)^x - x^x) \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 04 2018
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, May 04 2018
ext: More digits from _Alois P. Heinz_, May 04 2018
